about_the_game:
Welcome to Gunnies – where explosive action meets absolute chaos in a zany third-person shooter like no other!

Join the Battle

In Gunnies, it’s all about the thrill of PvP combat. Choose your team and jump into intense, fast-paced deathmatches where every second counts. Fight your way to victory by outmaneuvering enemy players, outsmarting traps, and mastering unique weapons that bring explosive results. With chaotic, ever-evolving arenas and unpredictable hazards, Gunnies keeps you on your toes!

Face the Zombunny Horde

While your main target is the opposing team, the Zombunnies won’t make it easy! These relentless, zombified bunnies spawn throughout the map, adding an extra layer of challenge. Work with your team to fend off waves of these bouncy foes, but stay sharp – they’re just as dangerous as the players you’re fighting!

Embrace the Madness

Get ready for surprises! Each map features special traps and random events that can change the flow of battle in an instant. From exploding carrots to hidden pitfalls, these hazards are as much a part of the battlefield as your opponents.

Unique Weapons for Unique Playstyles

Choose from a range of quirky weapons, each with unique effects to suit your playstyle. Go stealthy, go loud, or go explosive – every weapon adds a new twist to the action and can turn the tide in your favor when used strategically.

Key Features

  • PvP-Focused Action: Experience the thrill of player-vs-player combat with up to X players per match.

  • Zombunny Challenge: Face waves of Zombunnies that add a new layer of tension to every encounter.

  • Dynamic Maps: Navigate hazard-filled maps with traps and random events that keep the gameplay fresh.

  • Unique Weapons: Wield an array of crazy weapons, each with its own hilarious and deadly effects.

  • Team Play: Work together or go solo – strategize with your team or forge your own path to victory.

name: Gunnies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 4350 or Equivalent, Intel Core i3 6300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7730, NVIDIA GeForce® GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 CPU or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 290, NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Gunnies is a fast-paced PvP third-person shooter where players clash in intense deathmatches, facing traps, map hazards, and waves of zombified bunnies.
